title: DDFP 488: Week 1 Best Wins, Worst Losses & 'Time Machine Football'
itunes:title: DDFP 488: Week 1 Best Wins, Worst Losses & 'Time Machine Football'
description:
Shek is joined by Ike Taylor and Maurice Jones-Drew to discuss the Raiders' gutsy decision to go for two, the best first contract quarterbacks and give advice to Darrelle Revis and Josh Norman. Then, the guys break down the best wins and worst losses from Week 1, highlighting the Patriots' win and the Jets' loss. Also, MJD talks about Kaepernick's effect on the 49ers and the guys review his radio calls. Plus, Shek debuts "Time Machine Football," a segment where the guys review the 1981 wild card playoff game between the Jets and Bills in anticipation of Thursday Night Football.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
